description: A blurry, slightly overexposed shot shows a crowd of people behind a metal barricade, with a person in a light-colored t-shirt facing the camera and another person wearing a cap in the foreground on the left.
A blurry crowd of runners and spectators is visible, with a woman smoking a cigarette in the foreground.
A person wearing a backpack walks past a blurred crowd of people standing near a tree-lined street.
A crowd of people is running a race on a paved road lined with trees.
A crowd of people, many in running attire, are gathered in a park-like setting.
A blurry, grainy home movie shows a group of people, mostly wearing light-colored clothes, running on a road, with a young person in darker clothing running in front of them.
A person wearing a white hat and the number 62 crosses the finish line of a race as spectators cheer.
Two people wearing white tank tops are seen from behind, their bodies blurred and tinted purple.
A grainy, sepia-toned image shows the finish line of a race with a banner reading "FRONT RUNNERS NY" and "FINISH", surrounded by spectators and runners.
A mauve or dusty rose surface with small, dark flecks scattered across it is visible.
A blurry home video shows a group of people, one of whom is smiling at the camera.
A grainy, slightly blurred image shows a man running in a road race, with other runners slightly out of focus behind and to the sides of him.
A blurry image shows a person's face.
A group of runners in white and light-colored clothing stands at a starting line while a man in white pants takes a picture.
Two men wearing tank tops and shorts walk away from the camera.
A group of runners moves down a tree-lined road as people watch from the side.
Two young men stand close together, one with his arm around the other's shoulders.
A blurry, slightly overexposed image shows a group of men in suits and casual wear.
A blurry, faded image shows a group of people.
A blurry image shows a man running in a race, wearing a light-colored tank top with dark lettering and the number 1065.
A crowd of runners crosses the finish line of a race, under a banner that reads "FINISH" and a digital clock that shows 00:24:58.
A grainy image shows the finish line of a race, with a digital clock reading "002500", a banner that says "FRONT RUNNERS NY FINISH", and a crowd of people.
A blurry crowd of people stands behind a fence.
A sepia-toned image shows a finish line banner that reads "FRONT RUNNERS NY" and "FINISH" with a blurred crowd of runners crossing it.
A blurry, slightly purple-tinted home video shows several people walking in a wooded area.
A blurry, slightly faded image shows several people running a race, with spectators lining the course.
A blurry image shows two people, one in a light-colored tank top and another partially obscured on the left side of the frame, in front of some trees.
